The provided documents state that Matthias Lerch studied under Karl Weierstrass, not the other way around.

mistral.reason: Karl Weierstrass was not a doctoral student of Mathias Lerch. Instead, Mathias Lerch studied under Karl Weierstrass at the University of Berlin during 1884-85.

gemma2.reason: Several texts state that Lerch was a student of Weierstrass, not the other way around.

llama3.1.reason: The claim is wrong because Mathias Lerch was actually a student of Karl Weierstrass, not the other way around.

qwen2.5.reason: Karl Weierstrass was a professor of mathematics and not a doctoral student. He taught at the Königliches Gewerbeinstitut, which later became the Technische Universität Berlin, and had students like Adolf Hurwitz and Vojtěch Jarník, among others.
